/opt/rocm/bin/hipcc    -std=c++14 -Wno-deprecated-declarations -D__HIP_HCC_COMPAT_MODE__=1 -Wno-unused-command-line-argument -O3 -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/client.dir/Client.cpp.o CMakeFiles/client.dir/MathTemplates.cpp.o CMakeFiles/client.dir/SolutionHelper.cpp.o CMakeFiles/client.dir/Tools.cpp.o CMakeFiles/client.dir/Solutions.cpp.o CMakeFiles/client.dir/Kernels.cpp.o  -o client /opt/rocm/lib/libhsa-runtime64.so -Wl,-rpath,/opt/rocm/lib
